attributes.action: There should be no extension of open border after Brexit terminal date.
attributes.background: Open borders was one of the major reasons for people voting LEAVE the EU. Any extension would be totally unacceptable.

rejection.details:
Petitions need to call on the UK Government or Parliament to take a specific action. You could start a new petition explaining clearly what you would like the Government or Parliament to do. 

If you are concerned about immigration, you might like to sign this petition:  https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/175134
